name: Modern Great Banquet
description:
A modern adaptation of "The Parable of the Great Banquet".

Your main goal is to look for the 3 invited guests scattered in NSEW Map.

More features like mini side quests, buy a property for a passive income, work in a factory for some golds, find the secret door that leads to a new side game.

Hope you consider donating. ^^ Thank you and enjoy! ^^
